duties_responsibilities.duty: Watch and report live events of sports games including runs, kicks, throws, and tackles.
Participate in a training and testing program to ensure accurate data collection and analysis.
Collect and analyze data from sports matches to provide comprehensive game analyses.
Demonstrate regular availability on weekends and weekday evenings for game coverage.
Utilize smartphone technology for data collection and reporting.

education_certification.credential: Above-average knowledge of American Football, Basketball, Volleyball, Ice Hockey, and/or Soccer with regard to the laws of the game, basic tactics, and jargon
